name: Solitude (Garrett Widner)
description:
I made this back in 20...12? For my Mom, based off of a dream  she had when she was young. You also play as her. There's also a seeeeecret

Made on an old version of Gamemaker, so I'm not sure if it will play on all computers. If not... sorry :/ I don't have access to the original project files anymore.

As usual, music by THE Kevin MacLeod of Incompetech.
